name: Quick Puzzles
description: Quick Puzzles is a 25-piece puzzle game that is not very difficult. The game consists of 25 levels of varying difficulty. All elements are already on the playing field and all that remains is to swap them. Swap parts of the puzzle and compose the image. At the beginning of the game, you are given 5 seconds to look at and remember the image. As soon as all the pieces of the puzzle are in place, a button will appear to continue the game and you will go to the next level. The game has a level selection map, and you can start the game from any image. Management - mouse. Esc - interrupt the game.
